Stun/Fascinate:Unknown Effect 128 (100)?
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Affects Sacreds Only [sacredonly], May Use Underwater [uwok])
With a holy word from the next true God the priest is able to stun a sacred warrior of a false pretender.
